p: The CMIP5 data used for this study can be downloaded at http://cmip-pcmdi.llnl.gov/cmip5/data_portal.html and the GFDL model data can be downloaded at http://nomads.gfdl.noaa.gov:8080/DataPortal/cmip5.jsp. Other data that support the findings of this study are available from the corresponding author upon request.
